Posts.Content: Hi, did you have a Oncotype DX test done on your biopsy? This test is helpful in directing your treatment plan and also gives you a guide about re-occurance rate,etc......? Ask your Doctor about this and make your Doctor sit and listen to your concerns and get anwsers to the questions you have! I will send up a prayer for you! Without my Faith i Would have thrown in the towel a long time ago!!! My best to you! V-
Posts.Title: Breast cancer re-occurance...
